spec_data.Name: python2-ccdproc
spec_data.Description:
The ccdproc package is a collection of code that will be helpful in basic CCD
processing. These steps will allow reduction of basic CCD data as either a
stand-alone processing or as part of a pipeline.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:13:08 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Astropy affiliated package for reducing optical/IR CCD data
